section.title: LibSVM Interface
section.para: This is an &ffi-pac;-based interface to the version 2.82 of LibSVM (included in the sources, so you do not need to install it yourself).
The package LIBSVM is case-sensitive, and you do not need the svm_ prefix for the functions described in modules/libsvm/README.
section.simpara: When this module is present, &features-var; contains the symbol :LIBSVM.
